thread.title: Test Your Smarts on…Student Debt

author: Cheryl Winokur Munk
title: Test Your Smarts on…Student Debt

organizations.name: federal reserve bank of new york

text:
Student-loan debt has been on a relentless upward trajectory over the past two decades. It stood at $1.4 trillion nationwide as of the fourth quarter of 2017, according to the Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s quarterly report on household debt and credit. Student debt is the second-largest source of household debt, behind housing loans.
Rising student debt is a vexing problem for many people. More students are taking out loans—and for larger amounts, on average—and repayment rates have slowed, according to Federal Reserve...
